title: Oyo to double properties for Char Dham Yatra this year
description: Oyo has seen a 206% increase in bookings for the Yatra compared to the same period in 2020; Srinagar in Pauri Garhwal district is the most visited location. The diversity in locations allows the company to provide pilgrims with lodging throughout their journey. The Uttarakhand government reports 1.6 million registrations for this year's pilgrimage.
